title: Zooming glitch?
body: I have a problem after the latest patch that the screen will sometimes zoom in or out by itself but my mouse don't have wheels. I wonder if there is a way to control zooming with keys?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Well...

>I have a problem after the latest patch that the screen will sometimes zoom in or out by itself 

Are you sure you're not pressing anything before this happens? your other question kind of indicates that you might be
>I wonder if there is a way to control zooming with keys?

If you're unsure of your current keybinds they can be viewed in the in-game options menu.
